attributes.action: Sack Ben Wallace for not supporting the evacuation of Pen Farthing and team
attributes.background: Immediate sacking of Ben Wallace for undermining   Boris Johnson’s decision to allow Pen Farthing and his team and all their animals to return safely  to the UK

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
